profile:
We are committed to providing an excellent service across Toronto, GTA and nearby regions. In our decade of experience, we have learned that you can get your appliance, HVAC, electrical and plumbing issues repaired quickly, effectively, and relatively inexpensively. Our specialty is to provide quick solutions to all your appliance, plumbing, HVAC and electrical repairs and to achieve the highest possible customer satisfaction from our services. Our punctual and friendly staff will always provide budget-friendly repairs.

WHY DO OUR CUSTOMERS LOVE US?
"Slow is smooth, smooth is fast." This is our motto because we take exceptional care in locating your appliance and plumbing faults to have them fixed within the shortest possible period. We encourage our customers to watch us as we perform the repair and to ask as many questions as possible while we are on site. This will ensure the best service on the market because you will be educated on all of your appliances at no extra cost.
Man With a Wrench always provides an above and beyond service because we do not simply tackle the problem at hand. We also find its underlying cause. Most importantly, we provide our customers with education as to how to prevent such problems from occurring in the future. Our budget-friendly repairs are second to none and we will provide you with quick solutions to all of your appliance repair needs. Our goal is to delight you with our service. If you don’t go shouting from the rooftops how happy you are with your service following a work order, we will be very disappointed, for our business runs on word-of-mouth referrals and we strive to ensure you’re happy enough to tell your friends about our service

WHAT APPLIANCE REPAIR SERVICES DO WE OFFER?
We will repair any major appliance and any major brand for: 
- Refrigerators repair 
- Stove repair 
- Oven repair 
- Washing Machine repair 
- Dryer repair 
- Dishwasher repair 
- Microwave repair

We repair all makes and models, we even repair Miele appliances! Other brands we service regularly: Frigidaire, Simmons, Samsung, LG, GE, Kenmore, Thermadore, Whirlpool, Kenmore, Maytag, Moffat, Dacor, Fisher and Paykel, Thermador, Electrolux, Bosch, Sub Zero, Amana, Jenn-Air, Wolf, AEG, Magic Chef, Viking, Blomberg, Admiral, Westing House, Ariston, MagicChef, Inglis - IF THE Brand is not on the list WE CAN DO IT (we just missed it).

WHAT PLUMBING SERVICES DO WE OFFER?
- Toilet repair 
- Drain cleaning
- Plumbing repairs
- New installations (sinks, toilets, showers) 
- Water pumps
- Water heaters
- Frozen pipes
- Re-piping
- Burst Pipes
- Leak Detection 
- Inspections

We service Toronto and all surrounding areas. That includes: Toronto, Whitby, Oshawa, Pickering, Scarborough, Markham, Aurora, Newmarket, Brampton, Bradford, Oakville, Mississauga, Etobicoke, North York, East York, GTA, Burlington, Barrie, Innisfil and all of the cities that surround the cities listed


We look forward to servicing your appliance and plumbing HVAC and electrical repair needs!

profile:
Granstone is an Ottawa-based leading provider of custom kitchen, basement and  bathroom renovations as well as fabricators and installers of stone countertops.  
We can do anything you require from full custom cabinets, flooring, backsplash, and countertops.   We have also recently added an electrical division with certified master electricians on staff.
Whatever your renovation needs we can help you do it! We have a wide selection of granite and natural stone countertops. 
Granstone employees approach each and every one of their projects as if it were their own. We strive to create a professional environment for our customers in order to ensure that every experience is a positive one. 

Should you have at any point in time some questions, please do not hesitate to contact our knowledgeable staff:
-via phone (613-733-0391)

profile:
Tesona Electric Inc. is a family operated, fully serviced and licensed electrical company in the Ottawa area. Operated by Remi Clouthier a Master Electrician with 20 years in the electrical trade. 

Remi has put his heart and soul into providing outstanding electrical service to major electrical companies in the Ottawa and surrounding regions for many years now and wants to provide the same exceptional service to his own customers. 

We will always treat your space as if it were our own. We offer guarantees on all our work and will provide our electrical services while keeping your family or co-workers safe as we hold safety most important above all else.

 Let us show you what a great job we can do for you and call or email us for a quote today!

profile:
Commercial
With a wide range of commercial experience, let us take care of all your commercial needs. 


Residential
Kitchens, bathrooms, basements, whole homes and more. We've got you covered.

 
Lighting Consultations
Finding the perfect lighting solutions for your home or office can be a challenge. Let us help.


Co-owner Rob Bittner is a Master Licensed Electrician who is originally from Edmonton, Alberta. Rob moved to the area in 2009 and began working for an electrical company specializing in commercial and residential wiring. Before moving to Ottawa Rob worked in the film industry for 30+ years where he was involved in lighting design and power distribution. This unique experience and knowledge allows him to provide clients with expert insight into areas such as lighting quality and design. When Rob isn't quoting jobs, designing layouts or working with the tools he enjoys camping and fishing both of which are not as fun without his wife or grandkids


Co-owner Scott Cleator is a Licensed Electrician who grew up in Bracebridge, Ontario. He moved to Ottawa in 2010 to work for a local electrical contractor, completing his full apprenticeship in 2014. Before this he attended Nipissing University to study business administration as well as Canadore College where he enrolled in a pre-apprenticeship-electrical program. Scott's electrical portfolio ranges from high-end kitchen and bathroom renovations to full restaurant remodels and more. When Scott isn't working at the job-site or pricing prospective jobs, he enjoys spending time at his family cottage, fishing and hiking with his wife Lauren, golfing and (attempting) to learn to play the guitar.
name: Lumos Electric Inc

Taisto's Electric provides residential and commercial electrical work. We are fully insured, with a licensed master electrician that will safely complete your electrical needs on time and with quality workmanship.

profile:
People depend on electricity now more than ever. It keeps us connected to the world around us, it keeps our food fresh, it drives industries worldwide. Because we all depend on electricity to get us through the days, you need to make sure that your home or business is wired correctly by a trained professional.

There are obvious inconveniences that come with unreliable electricity, but there are bigger concerns than spoiled food or not being able to check your inbox. When your home or business’s wiring, or even just a small feature of it, hasn’t been connected by a trained professional, you have to be prepared for the possibility of an electrical fire.

There is too much in your home and business to choose an unqualified contractor to handle your electrical needs. If you want to ensure the security, function and efficiency of your electricity, it starts with a call to Regional Electric Corp..

For the last several years, Regional Electric Corp. has been providing expert residential and commercial electrical services to homes and businesses all over the area. Since our first year in the electrical business, Regional Electric Corp. has had our sights set on being the clear-cut best option for any electrical service a client in the area may require. We do this by constantly training our electricians to add more skills to better serve our clientele. We also always make sure we are on time because reliable service produces reliable results. Plus, we respect and value our customer’s time.

Whenever you need help with anything related to your home or business’s electrical services, give Regional Electric Corp. a call and we’ll be happy to assist you.
name: Regional Electric

profile:
The Floodlight Electric story began a little unconventional. Joel and Rob were both participating in an electrical golf tournament and were paired together. After getting to know each other over a couple drives, putts and pints, they realized that they were virtually neighbours. 

They began a friendship bonding over many more rounds of golf as well as other sports like dodgeball. Eventually they began working together at the same electrical company, and were coworkers for several years. 

Joel and Rob had discussed how it was their dream to become entrepreneurs and business owners one day. They believed that their skill sets were complementary and could be the beginning of something great if they took the leap of faith.

In May 2016, they finally opened up the electrical contracting company of their dreams, Floodlight Electric. Fast forward to today, and Floodlight Electric has quickly solidified themselves into the residential, commercial and government markets in Ottawa with a growing team.

Floodlight Electric was founded to enhance the customer experience with electricians. The company was built on the foundation of trust, honesty and professionalism. Floodlight Electric has provided reliable electrical services to thousands of home owners and businesses in Ottawa, ON. The entire team of electricians are seasoned industry professionals that are licensed to perform electrical services in accordance to code and regulations.
name: Floodlight Electric Inc.
